sentences.english: Changhong Century Town is located at Peicheng District, Mianyang City. Its Phase I was already built up.
sentences.chinese: 長虹世紀城位於綿陽涪城區，世紀城一期基本建成。

sentences.english: Chengdu and Mianyang are the production bases for textiles and electronics products.
sentences.chinese: 成都和綿陽爲紡織和電子產品基地。

sentences.english: In Wenchuan earthquake, Most building structures were damaged for different degrees in Mianyang city.
sentences.chinese: 汶川地震中，綿陽市大部分房屋均有不同程度破壞。

sentences.english: It contains as following:Chapter 1 introduces the history and actuality of social insurance in China.

sentences.english: Mianyang also has four distinct seasons, but winter is comparatively warmer.
sentences.chinese: 綿陽四季分明，冬天相對說來比較溫暖。

sentences.english: General situation of mineral resources and exploitation of Mianyang City is given.
sentences.chinese: 綿陽市礦業發展概況及近年礦產開發基本情況。

sentences.english: It is located close to the Anchang River (the second-largest body of water that runs through Mianyang).
sentences.chinese: 並且距離流經綿陽綿陽的第二大河安昌河很近。

sentences.english: An investigation of cave-dwelling bats was conducted in Mianyang, Sichuan Province from 1999 to 2005.
sentences.chinese: 2005年，對四川省綿陽市洞棲性蝙蝠進行了調查。

sentences.english: He is from the city of Mianyang in Sichuan, northeast of the earthquake’s epicenter.
sentences.chinese: 他來自四川省的綿陽市，位於地震震中的東北方向。

sentences.english: Water from the lake on Jianjiang River flowed into the Fujiang River that runs through Mianyang city.
sentences.chinese: 導出的澗江上堰塞湖的水注入到了流經綿陽的涪江。

sentences.english: Bus No.48 will take you to the airport from downtown Mianyang.
sentences.chinese: 48路巴士往返於機場和綿陽之間。

sentences.english: Promoting agriculture of Mianyang in 90's is the evitable requirement of economic development.

sentences.english: At least 1,000 students and teachers were dead or missing when the main building of Beichuan Middle School in Mianyang City collapsed.
